00031 void b3OptimizedBvh::build(b3StridingMeshInterface* triangles, bool useQuantizedAabbCompression, const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMin, const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMax)
00032 {
00033         m_useQuantization = useQuantizedAabbCompression;
00034 
00035 
00036         // NodeArray    triangleNodes;
00037 
00038         struct  NodeTriangleCallback : public b3InternalTriangleIndexCallback
00039         {
00040 
00041                 NodeArray&      m_triangleNodes;
00042 
00043                 NodeTriangleCallback& operator=(NodeTriangleCallback& other)
00044                 {
00045                         m_triangleNodes.copyFromArray(other.m_triangleNodes);
00046                         return *this;
00047                 }
00048                 
00049                 NodeTriangleCallback(NodeArray& triangleNodes)
00050                         :m_triangleNodes(triangleNodes)
00051                 {
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 virtual void internalProcessTriangleIndex(b3Vector3* triangle,int partId,int  triangleIndex)
00055                 {
00056                         b3OptimizedBvhNode node;
00057                         b3Vector3       aabbMin,aabbMax;
00058                         aabbMin.setValue(b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT));
00059                         aabbMax.setValue(b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT)); 
00060                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[0]);
00061                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[0]);
00062                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[1]);
00063                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[1]);
00064                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[2]);
00065                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[2]);
00066 
00067                         //with quantization?
00068                         node.m_aabbMinOrg = aabbMin;
00069                         node.m_aabbMaxOrg = aabbMax;
00070 
00071                         node.m_escapeIndex = -1;
00072         
00073                         //for child nodes
00074                         node.m_subPart = partId;
00075                         node.m_triangleIndex = triangleIndex;
00076                         m_triangleNodes.push_back(node);
00077                 }
00078         };
00079         struct  QuantizedNodeTriangleCallback : public b3InternalTriangleIndexCallback
00080         {
00081                 QuantizedNodeArray&     m_triangleNodes;
00082                 const b3QuantizedBvh* m_optimizedTree; // for quantization
00083 
00084                 QuantizedNodeTriangleCallback& operator=(QuantizedNodeTriangleCallback& other)
00085                 {
00086                         m_triangleNodes.copyFromArray(other.m_triangleNodes);
00087                         m_optimizedTree = other.m_optimizedTree;
00088                         return *this;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 QuantizedNodeTriangleCallback(QuantizedNodeArray&       triangleNodes,const b3QuantizedBvh* tree)
00092                         :m_triangleNodes(triangleNodes),m_optimizedTree(tree)
00093                 {
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 virtual void internalProcessTriangleIndex(b3Vector3* triangle,int partId,int  triangleIndex)
00097                 {
00098                         // The partId and triangle index must fit in the same (positive) integer
00099                         b3Assert(partId < (1<<MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS));
00100                         b3Assert(triangleIndex < (1<<(31-MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS)));
00101                         //negative indices are reserved for escapeIndex
00102                         b3Assert(triangleIndex>=0);
00103 
00104                         b3QuantizedBvhNode node;
00105                         b3Vector3       aabbMin,aabbMax;
00106                         aabbMin.setValue(b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT));
00107                         aabbMax.setValue(b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT)); 
00108                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[0]);
00109                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[0]);
00110                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[1]);
00111                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[1]);
00112                         aabbMin.setMin(triangle[2]);
00113                         aabbMax.setMax(triangle[2]);
00114 
00115                         //PCK: add these checks for zero dimensions of aabb
00116                         const b3Scalar MIN_AABB_DIMENSION = b3Scalar(0.002);
00117                         const b3Scalar MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION = b3Scalar(0.001);
00118                         if (aabbMax.getX() - aabbMin.getX() < MIN_AABB_DIMENSION)
00119                         {
00120                                 aabbMax.setX(aabbMax.getX() + MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00121                                 aabbMin.setX(aabbMin.getX() - MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00122                         }
00123                         if (aabbMax.getY() - aabbMin.getY() < MIN_AABB_DIMENSION)
00124                         {
00125                                 aabbMax.setY(aabbMax.getY() + MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00126                                 aabbMin.setY(aabbMin.getY() - MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00127                         }
00128                         if (aabbMax.getZ() - aabbMin.getZ() < MIN_AABB_DIMENSION)
00129                         {
00130                                 aabbMax.setZ(aabbMax.getZ() + MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00131                                 aabbMin.setZ(aabbMin.getZ() - MIN_AABB_HALF_DIMENSION);
00132                         }
00133 
00134                         m_optimizedTree->quantize(&node.m_quantizedAabbMin[0],aabbMin,0);
00135                         m_optimizedTree->quantize(&node.m_quantizedAabbMax[0],aabbMax,1);
00136 
00137                         node.m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = (partId<<(31-MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS)) | triangleIndex;
00138 
00139                         m_triangleNodes.push_back(node);
00140                 }
00141         };
00142         
00143 
00144 
00145         int numLeafNodes = 0;
00146 
00147         
00148         if (m_useQuantization)
00149         {
00150 
00151                 //initialize quantization values
00152                 setQuantizationValues(bvhAabbMin,bvhAabbMax);
00153 
00154                 QuantizedNodeTriangleCallback   callback(m_quantizedLeafNodes,this);
00155 
00156         
00157                 triangles->InternalProcessAllTriangles(&callback,m_bvhAabbMin,m_bvhAabbMax);
00158 
00159                 //now we have an array of leafnodes in m_leafNodes
00160                 numLeafNodes = m_quantizedLeafNodes.size();
00161 
00162 
00163                 m_quantizedContiguousNodes.resize(2*numLeafNodes);
00164 
00165 
00166         } else
00167         {
00168                 NodeTriangleCallback    callback(m_leafNodes);
00169 
00170                 b3Vector3 aabbMin=b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT));
00171                 b3Vector3 aabbMax=b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT));
00172 
00173                 triangles->InternalProcessAllTriangles(&callback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00174 
00175                 //now we have an array of leafnodes in m_leafNodes
00176                 numLeafNodes = m_leafNodes.size();
00177 
00178                 m_contiguousNodes.resize(2*numLeafNodes);
00179         }
00180 
00181         m_curNodeIndex = 0;
00182 
00183         buildTree(0,numLeafNodes);
00184 
00186         if(m_useQuantization && !m_SubtreeHeaders.size())
00187         {
00188                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders.expand();
00189                 subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0]);
00190                 subtree.m_rootNodeIndex = 0;
00191                 subtree.m_subtreeSize = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0].isLeafNode() ? 1 : m_quantizedContiguousNodes[0].getEscapeIndex();
00192         }
00193 
00194         //PCK: update the copy of the size
00195         m_subtreeHeaderCount = m_SubtreeHeaders.size();
00196 
00197         //PCK: clear m_quantizedLeafNodes and m_leafNodes, they are temporary
00198         m_quantizedLeafNodes.clear();
00199         m_leafNodes.clear();
00200 }

00205 void    b3OptimizedBvh::refit(b3StridingMeshInterface* meshInterface,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax)
00206 {
00207         if (m_useQuantization)
00208         {
00209 
00210                 setQuantizationValues(aabbMin,aabbMax);
00211 
00212                 updateBvhNodes(meshInterface,0,m_curNodeIndex,0);
00213 
00215 
00216                 int i;
00217                 for (i=0;i<m_SubtreeHeaders.size();i++)
00218                 {
00219                         b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders[i];
00220                         subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[subtree.m_rootNodeIndex]);
00221                 }
00222 
00223         } else
00224         {
00225 
00226         }
00227 }

00231 
00232 void    b3OptimizedBvh::refitPartial(b3StridingMeshInterface* meshInterface,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax)
00233 {
00234         //incrementally initialize quantization values
00235         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00236 
00237         b3Assert(aabbMin.getX() > m_bvhAabbMin.getX());
00238         b3Assert(aabbMin.getY() > m_bvhAabbMin.getY());
00239         b3Assert(aabbMin.getZ() > m_bvhAabbMin.getZ());
00240 
00241         b3Assert(aabbMax.getX() < m_bvhAabbMax.getX());
00242         b3Assert(aabbMax.getY() < m_bvhAabbMax.getY());
00243         b3Assert(aabbMax.getZ() < m_bvhAabbMax.getZ());
00244 
00247         
00248         unsigned short  quantizedQueryAabbMin[3];
00249         unsigned short  quantizedQueryAabbMax[3];
00250 
00251         quantize(&quantizedQueryAabbMin[0],aabbMin,0);
00252         quantize(&quantizedQueryAabbMax[0],aabbMax,1);
00253 
00254         int i;
00255         for (i=0;i<this->m_SubtreeHeaders.size();i++)
00256         {
00257                 b3BvhSubtreeInfo& subtree = m_SubtreeHeaders[i];
00258 
00259                 //PCK: unsigned instead of bool
00260                 unsigned overlap = b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(quantizedQueryAabbMin,quantizedQueryAabbMax,subtree.m_quantizedAabbMin,subtree.m_quantizedAabbMax);
00261                 if (overlap != 0)
00262                 {
00263                         updateBvhNodes(meshInterface,subtree.m_rootNodeIndex,subtree.m_rootNodeIndex+subtree.m_subtreeSize,i);
00264 
00265                         subtree.setAabbFromQuantizeNode(m_quantizedContiguousNodes[subtree.m_rootNodeIndex]);
00266                 }
00267         }
00268         
00269 }
00270 
00271 void    b3OptimizedBvh::updateBvhNodes(b3StridingMeshInterface* meshInterface,int firstNode,int endNode,int index)
00272 {
00273         (void)index;
00274 
00275         b3Assert(m_useQuantization);
00276 
00277         int curNodeSubPart=-1;
00278 
00279         //get access info to trianglemesh data
00280                 const unsigned char *vertexbase = 0;
00281                 int numverts = 0;
00282                 PHY_ScalarType type = PHY_INTEGER;
00283                 int stride = 0;
00284                 const unsigned char *indexbase = 0;
00285                 int indexstride = 0;
00286                 int numfaces = 0;
00287                 PHY_ScalarType indicestype = PHY_INTEGER;
00288 
00289                 b3Vector3       triangleVerts[3];
00290                 b3Vector3       aabbMin,aabbMax;
00291                 const b3Vector3& meshScaling = meshInterface->getScaling();
00292                 
00293                 int i;
00294                 for (i=endNode-1;i>=firstNode;i--)
00295                 {
00296 
00297 
00298                         b3QuantizedBvhNode& curNode = m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i];
00299                         if (curNode.isLeafNode())
00300                         {
00301                                 //recalc aabb from triangle data
00302                                 int nodeSubPart = curNode.getPartId();
00303                                 int nodeTriangleIndex = curNode.getTriangleIndex();
00304                                 if (nodeSubPart != curNodeSubPart)
00305                                 {
00306                                         if (curNodeSubPart >= 0)
00307                                                 meshInterface->unLockReadOnlyVertexBase(curNodeSubPart);
00308                                         meshInterface->getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase(&vertexbase,numverts,   type,stride,&indexbase,indexstride,numfaces,indicestype,nodeSubPart);
00309 
00310                                         curNodeSubPart = nodeSubPart;
00311                                         b3Assert(indicestype==PHY_INTEGER||indicestype==PHY_SHORT);
00312                                 }
00313                                 //triangles->getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase(vertexBase,numVerts,
00314 
00315                                 unsigned int* gfxbase = (unsigned int*)(indexbase+nodeTriangleIndex*indexstride);
00316                                 
00317                                 
00318                                 for (int j=2;j>=0;j--)
00319                                 {
00320                                         
00321                                         int graphicsindex = indicestype==PHY_SHORT?((unsigned short*)gfxbase)[j]:gfxbase[j];
00322                                         if (type == PHY_FLOAT)
00323                                         {
00324                                                 float* graphicsbase = (float*)(vertexbase+graphicsindex*stride);
00325                                                 triangleVerts[j] = b3MakeVector3(
00326                                                         graphicsbase[0]*meshScaling.getX(),
00327                                                         graphicsbase[1]*meshScaling.getY(),
00328                                                         graphicsbase[2]*meshScaling.getZ());
00329                                         }
00330                                         else
00331                                         {
00332                                                 double* graphicsbase = (double*)(vertexbase+graphicsindex*stride);
00333                                                 triangleVerts[j] = b3MakeVector3( b3Scalar(graphicsbase[0]*meshScaling.getX()), b3Scalar(graphicsbase[1]*meshScaling.getY()), b3Scalar(graphicsbase[2]*meshScaling.getZ()));
00334                                         }
00335                                 }
00336 
00337 
00338                                 
00339                                 aabbMin.setValue(b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(B3_LARGE_FLOAT));
00340                                 aabbMax.setValue(b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT),b3Scalar(-B3_LARGE_FLOAT)); 
00341                                 aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[0]);
00342                                 aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[0]);
00343                                 aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[1]);
00344                                 aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[1]);
00345                                 aabbMin.setMin(triangleVerts[2]);
00346                                 aabbMax.setMax(triangleVerts[2]);
00347 
00348                                 quantize(&curNode.m_quantizedAabbMin[0],aabbMin,0);
00349                                 quantize(&curNode.m_quantizedAabbMax[0],aabbMax,1);
00350                                 
00351                         } else
00352                         {
00353                                 //combine aabb from both children
00354 
00355                                 b3QuantizedBvhNode* leftChildNode = &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i+1];
00356                                 
00357                                 b3QuantizedBvhNode* rightChildNode = leftChildNode->isLeafNode() ? &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i+2] :
00358                                         &m_quantizedContiguousNodes[i+1+leftChildNode->getEscapeIndex()];
00359                                 
00360 
00361                                 {
00362                                         for (int i=0;i<3;i++)
00363                                         {
00364                                                 curNode.m_quantizedAabbMin[i] = leftChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMin[i];
00365                                                 if (curNode.m_quantizedAabbMin[i]>rightChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMin[i])
00366                                                         curNode.m_quantizedAabbMin[i]=rightChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMin[i];
00367 
00368                                                 curNode.m_quantizedAabbMax[i] = leftChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMax[i];
00369                                                 if (curNode.m_quantizedAabbMax[i] < rightChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMax[i])
00370                                                         curNode.m_quantizedAabbMax[i] = rightChildNode->m_quantizedAabbMax[i];
00371                                         }
00372                                 }
00373                         }
00374 
00375                 }
00376 
00377                 if (curNodeSubPart >= 0)
00378                         meshInterface->unLockReadOnlyVertexBase(curNodeSubPart);
00379 
00380                 
00381 }

00384 b3OptimizedBvh* b3OptimizedBvh::deSerializeInPlace(void *i_alignedDataBuffer, unsigned int i_dataBufferSize, bool i_swapEndian)
00385 {
00386         b3QuantizedBvh* bvh = b3QuantizedBvh::deSerializeInPlace(i_alignedDataBuffer,i_dataBufferSize,i_swapEndian);
00387         
00388         //we don't add additional data so just do a static upcast
00389         return static_cast<b3OptimizedBvh*>(bvh);
00390 }
